resources.string: Feelshare is an application that let you see the world feelings and yours !
Are you sure you want to exit?
It’s a deep sense of satisfaction, gladness and fulfillment as result of desirable event or a fruitful outcome.
Depression is the result of state of low mood. Many factors are the reason of depression for example high level of sadness, anxiousness, hopeless, worried
A deep, gentle, overwhelming sense of affection and solicitude toward a individual
Funny is a tendency of specific experiences to make laughter and give amusement
Behaving disobediently or mischievously with the loved one, friend, known people and some-times even to teach a lesson
Cool is a state of calm where one feels as of completely free from whatsoever worries
Is an experience of a concise emotional state because of an unexpected event, sometimes it becomes shock if surprise is more powerful and/or long lasting
As the name says it’s a neutral feeling where you are not happy or sad, nor excited neither depressed, a feeling with satisfaction no ambition or desire
It is a strong emotional response by suitable provocations
Hungry is a strong desire for something
Confusion is a feeling of mixed-up with regards to one\’s sense of phase, place or character
Feel of laziness often caused by a temporary situation in a person\'s life
Boredom is a feeling to weary by dullness, tedious repetition, unwelcome attention. Boredom in life means life is demanding for change in some action
Shy is a feeling of having nervousness or timidity in the company of other people or groups
Sickness is an indication of the state of a person, who is not healthy or well. A state of illness
Scared is an emotion induced by a perceived threat which causes entities to quickly pull away from it and usually hide
Anger is a strong feeling intended to send the clear note “something is going wrong it has got to change”
Frustrated is a state of expressing distress, irritation or annoyance. A clear indication of anger combined with stress
Tired is a state of being too weary or feeling very exhausted
A wide variety of grief or losses can activate sadness
Crying is tear shedding as the result of hurt emotional state
You agree with the followings usage conditions.
Take a look at the world feelings
Detailed World Feelings displayed on map
